title: Binary Search Implementation
description: Implement a binary search algorithm that finds the index of a target value in a sorted array. Return -1 if the target is not found.
requirements: Takes two parameters: sorted array of numbers and target number
Returns the index of the target if found, -1 otherwise
Must use iterative binary search (not recursive)
Handle edge cases: empty array, single element, target not found
Time complexity must be O(log n)

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a linear search function that finds an element in an array.
Implement a function to find the maximum value in an array.
Implement a function to check if an array is sorted in ascending order.
